pages.title: -DNA-
pages.text: Genetic items obtained in loot chests have a difficulty level depending on the difficulty of the player's world $(br2) They also have bonuses: $(br2) Normal DNA sequence: +0.25 max health $ (br) Complex DNA sequence: +0.5 max health, +0.15 damage $ (br) Extremely complex DNA sequence: +0.75 max health, +0.25 damage $ (br) God-like DNA sequence: +1.0 max health, +0.35 damage
